trans-unit.source:
Dataset from the KDD Cup 1999 Knowledge Discovery and Data Mining Tools Competition (kddcup99.html).

The dataset was downloaded and stored in Azure Blob storage (networkintrusiondetection.csv) and includes both training and testing datasets.
trans-unit.target:
Dataset from the KDD Cup 1999 Knowledge Discovery and Data Mining Tools Competition (kddcup99.html).

The dataset was downloaded and stored in Azure Blob storage (networkintrusiondetection.csv) and includes both training and testing datasets.

trans-unit.source: The training dataset has approximately 126K rows and 43 columns, including the labels; 3 columns are part of the label information, and 40 columns, consisting of numeric and string/categorical features, are available for training the model.
trans-unit.target: The training dataset has approximately 126K rows and 43 columns, including the labels; 3 columns are part of the label information, and 40 columns, consisting of numeric and string/categorical features, are available for training the model.

trans-unit.source: The test data has approximately 22.5K test examples with the same 43 columns as in the training data.
trans-unit.target: The test data has approximately 22.5K test examples with the same 43 columns as in the training data.
